MissingPropsError.title: Missing Data
MissingPropsError.message: You must to rovide data to this form

MissingAuthorizationTokenFailure.title: Missing authorization token
MissingAuthorizationTokenFailure.message: It looks like you are not authenticated in the application
MissingAuthorizationTokenFailure.solution: Check if authentication token is provided or try to log-in again

UnauthorizedTokenFailure.title: Unauthorized token
UnauthorizedTokenFailure.message: The provided authentication token is invalid

UserInvalidPasswordError.title: Invalid credentials
UserInvalidPasswordError.message: The provided email or password is invalid

AuthAudPropsUndefinedException.title: Auth missing data
AuthAudPropsUndefinedException.message: There is no authentication content to generate a new authorization
AuthAudPropsUndefinedException.solution: Check if all required data was provided

UserRegistrationPropsUndefinedError.title: Missing user required props
UserRegistrationPropsUndefinedError.message: There is no registration content to create a new user
UserRegistrationPropsUndefinedError.solution: Check if all required data was provided

SearchPropositionsUndefinedPropsError.title: Missing search required props
SearchPropositionsUndefinedPropsError.message: There is no search props to make a search
SearchPropositionsUndefinedPropsError.solution: Check if all required data was provided

UserLoginPropsUndefinedError.title: Missing credentials required props
UserLoginPropsUndefinedError.message: There is no credentials content payload to handle login
UserLoginPropsUndefinedError.solution: Check if all required data was provided

UserInvalidEmailError.title: Invalid credentials
UserInvalidEmailError.message: The provided email or password is invalid

UserForgotPasswordPropsUndefinedError.title: Missing redefinition data
UserForgotPasswordPropsUndefinedError.message: There is no redefinition data payload to handle the reset password
UserForgotPasswordPropsUndefinedError.solution: Check if all required data was provided

UserResetPasswordPropsUndefinedError.title: Missing redefinition data
UserResetPasswordPropsUndefinedError.message: There is no redefinition data payload to handle the reset password
UserResetPasswordPropsUndefinedError.solution: Check if all required data was provided

TokenNotFoundError.title: Token not founded
TokenNotFoundError.message: Was not possible to find a token for provided user
TokenNotFoundError.solution: Check if the provided token has copied correctly or try the process again

ErrorMemberSelfDeleted.title: Forbidden Action
ErrorMemberSelfDeleted.message: You cannot delete your self invite
ErrorMemberSelfDeleted.solution: Ask to other administrator to remove your organization invite

ErrorMemberAlreadyInvited.title: User Already Invited
ErrorMemberAlreadyInvited.message: The provided email was already invited to join this organization
ErrorMemberAlreadyInvited.solution: It is possible to resend the invite

ErrorMemberNotFounded.title: Member not founded
ErrorMemberNotFounded.message: Was not possible to find organization invite

ErrorMemberInviteNotPending.title: It is not possible to Accept/decline the invite
ErrorMemberInviteNotPending.message: The invite is not pending anymore

SuccessUserRegistration.title: Please, check your email
SuccessUserRegistration.message: We sent an email to {{email}} with a confirmation link

SuccessUserActivation.title: Account Activated
SuccessUserActivation.message: Your account was activated, now you can login to the platform

SuccessActivationOrganizationMember.title: Pending approve
SuccessActivationOrganizationMember.message: We see that you are trying to create your account in our system with the domain '{{company_domain}}'. There is already an organization registered with this domain. We sent a request to the admin to confirm your access.
SuccessActivationOrganizationMember.solution: Don't worry, we've sent an email to {{company_admin_name}} Admin of this organization at Nomos requesting you to grant access. Once access is approved, we will notify you by email and send you instructions to log in to the platform.

SuccessAcceptOrganizationMember.title: User successfully accepted
SuccessAcceptOrganizationMember.message: User {{company_member_name}} has been accepted as a member of your organization

ValidateStringTypeMessage.message: Must to be a text value

ValidateNumberTypeMessage.message: Must to be a numeric value

ValidateBooleanTypeMessage.message: Must to be a boolean value (true/false)

ValidateArrayTypeMessage.message: Must to be a valid list

ValidateObjectTypeMessage.message: Must to be a valid object

ValidateMinLengthMessage.message: Must to contains at least {{size}} characters

ValidateInvalidObjectIdMessage.message: Invalid identifier format (Must to match ObjectId pattern)

ValidateInvalidUUIDV4Message.message: Invalid identifier format (Must to match UUID-V4 pattern)

ValidateEnumInvalidOptionMessage.message: Invalid provided option, The available options is: {{options}}

ValidateInvalidCnpjMessage.message: The provided document does not matches the brazilian organization number pattern

ValidateInvalidCpfjMessage.message: The provided document does not matches the brazilian organization/personal number pattern

ValidateInvalidCpfMessage.message: The provided document does not matches the brazilian personal number pattern

ValidateInvalidCepMessage.message: The provided zipcode does not matches the brazilian zipcode number pattern

ValidateInvalidE164Message.message: Must to be a number phone matching the e164 pattern

ValidateInvalidDateTimeFormatMessage.message: Must to be a valid date matching the pattern {{format}}

ValidateInvalidRangeMessage.message: The value must to be between {{range_start}} and {{range_end}}
